decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing title number(s): 101(P) (Block and Location Plans, 102 (P) (Existing Plans), 103 (P) (Existing Plans), 104 (P) (Existing Elevations), 105 (P) (Existing Elevations), 106 (P) (Proposed Plans), 107 (P) (Proposed Plans), 108 (P) (Proposed Elevations), 109 (P) (Proposed Elevations), 110 (P) (Existing and Proposed Sections), 112 (P) (Proposed Block and Location Plans).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the flat roof of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
